funFacts.text: Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not.
Octopuses have three hearts.
Honey never spoils.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on Earth.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Sharks existed before trees.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
Butterflies can taste with their feet.
The Eiffel Tower grows in summer.
Humans share about 60 percent of their DNA with bananas.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes.
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance.
Water can boil and freeze at the same time.
The human nose can remember 50,000 different scents.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
An octopus has blue blood.
The Great Wall of China is not visible from space with the naked eye.
Cows have best friends.
There are more possible games of chess than atoms in the observable universe.
Scotland has 421 different words for snow.
A bolt of lightning is five times hotter than the surface of the sun.
Turtles can breathe through their butts.
A shrimp’s heart is in its head.
Humans glow in the dark, but it is invisible to the naked eye.
Some cats are allergic to humans.
The unicorn is the national animal of Scotland.
Rain has a smell.
There are more trees on Earth than stars in the Milky Way.
An apple floats because it is 25 percent air.
Hot water freezes faster than cold water.
The Tardigrade can survive in space.
You cannot hum while holding your nose.
There are more bacteria in your mouth than people on Earth.
The human brain uses about 20 percent of the body's energy.
Jellyfish have existed for over 500 million years.
The fingerprints of a koala are almost identical to humans.
Your bones are constantly being replaced every 10 years.
A cloud can weigh over a million tons.
You produce about 1 liter of saliva every day.
Penguins propose with pebbles.
The longest hiccup attack lasted 68 years.
The average person walks the equivalent of three times around the world in their lifetime.
An eagle can see four times farther than a human.
A jiffy is an actual unit of time.
Spiders cannot fly, but they can float.
There is enough DNA in your body to stretch from the sun to Pluto and back.
Cheetahs cannot roar.
You blink about 20,000 times a day.
Elephants think humans are cute.
Your stomach acid can dissolve metal.
Some metals explode when put in water.
A human could swim through a blue whale’s veins.
There are more possible number combinations in a deck of cards than atoms on Earth.
A single hair can support up to 100 grams.
Your brain is faster than a supercomputer.
Some frogs can freeze without dying.
There is a species of jellyfish that is biologically immortal.
Mosquitoes are attracted to people who just ate bananas.
Your taste buds regenerate every two weeks.
Snails can sleep for up to three years.
The longest written novel contains over 21,000 pages.
Some birds sleep while flying.
A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out.
Sea otters hold hands while they sleep.
A goldfish can remember things for months.
The heart of a blue whale is as big as a car.
There are more phones than people on Earth.
Some plants can communicate with each other.
Humans are the only animals that blush.
The moon is slowly drifting away from Earth.
Your eyes stay the same size your entire life.
The human body glows slightly in the dark.
A lightning bolt is hotter than lava.
Bees can recognize human faces.
Your ears never stop growing.
A strawberry is not a berry.
Some turtles can breathe through their skin.
Your brain shrinks when you are dehydrated.
An ant can lift 50 times its own weight.
The human body has enough iron to make a small nail.
Time moves faster at the top of a building than at the bottom.
There are more insects than all other animals combined.
Avocados are poisonous to birds.
Your body replaces most of its cells every 7 to 10 years.
The smell of rain is called petrichor.
A bolt of lightning contains enough energy to toast 100,000 slices of bread.
There is a species of ant that farms aphids.
Some metals can remember their shape.
The largest desert in the world is Antarctica.
There are more atoms in a glass of water than glasses of water in all the oceans.
A human sneeze can travel up to 160 kilometers per hour.
The average cloud weighs over a million tons.
You share more DNA with a cat than with a fruit fly.
Some snakes can see through their skin.
A day on Mercury is longer than its year.
Your brain generates enough electricity to power a small light bulb.
There are more fake flamingos than real ones in the world.
Some sharks glow in the dark.
The human body contains enough fat to make seven bars of soap.
Your brain is about 75 percent water.
